body:
Alright, before I start, please do not state that Leaving Posts are not Allowed, I believe that I stayed a long time for this, and I may never come back, please don’t lock nor argue.

 I have to leave, why? Due to exams this year. These are very important exams that could and will determine my entire life. It is really important. Avicus has been a wonderful journey, even if it has some ups and downs. My journey started off when me and Billy (April) were looking for a server to play the Walls, that is when we found a suitable server with less lag called McZone. Our Journey occurred then. But then I heard that Billy got Jr Mod and I wanted to be a Mod as well. That is when I met all of you brilliant people who have brilliant independent qualities of your own. I met so many people who I made friends with, you lot who are brilliant people. I did my Staff Application and I got accepted and I got into my interview. That was one of my terrifying moments in Avicus, Detty, Howsie and Jozzy seemed like Gods compared to me (These guys interviewed me), it seemed like they were a dark shadow overlooking over my shoulder. But after the interview, I realised that these guys are like me, they weren’t terrifying people judging your every move. I thank you, the community for an amazing journey across the amazing land of Avicus, once known as McZone.

Here are some people I must thank.

  April aka. Billy: Do I really have to explain about this dude, this guy will always stick up for me, he is one of the greatest friends. Nothing more, nothing less. Thanks Mate!

NesaFairy: This Lass helped me through Avicus and taught me how to navigate through Avicus and through her, I made a lot of pretty good friends. Actually, she was the first Avicus friend I made through Avicus.

Tel6331: The first time I met him, this guy tempbanned me, I thought that he was literally the devil, laughing in his underground chamber, rambling about his power but when I provided my proof of that I shouldn’t be banned, I realised that this d00d is one of the nicest mods ever in Avicus. Also, this guy made me an objective to reach to in PvP Skills, I thank him for that.

Musician131Nay: My First Girlfriend <3

  Avumbaca: This Lass is in Cacalmarin, a clan that I was in for the last 6 months, and that journey was amazing. I thank her for improving my PvP. This gurl is one of the greatest friend I made in Avicus, and one of the first, a great person. Thou she might hate me now, I still value her as a friend.

StormzInvader: This guy always, always made me laugh, he is one of the funniest guys I met. He is also inspirational and a guy to look up to. Btw, he sounds like Markplier xD.

Jozzy and Yoav: These guys are soooooooooo nice to me, even if Yoav is quite sarcastic to me xD Jozzy taught me how to PvP and Yoav wrecked me in PvP to show that I have to learn more xD. Jozzy has always helped me through my problems and vice versa for him.

BUSTY: Hannah, always kind to me and she makes me laugh. She was like the first friend I made through Teamspeak and then it somehow went to KaraokeParty in Teamspeak with a whole lot of people with Vlad (He recorded it and I think he has the recording xD)  Do Not Change if I come back. #BustyLove<3

  AwesomeGirl, peaches_lovebirds, carrie_may, LMN: I can have some random conversions with these people :P Thanks for that

  Cacalmarin: Thanks for everything everyone in the clan, I thank you! You made me see that there are good people in this world.

  Para: A guy who sticks up for his own opinions and he values his opinions, somehow in everything he says, he has stability in those words. Look up to you dude!

  DaGoldBrick and TheTrail: This might sound weird but I want to thank these guys for teaching me a lesson which got me demoted. These guys, harassed me and I always lost my temper, I became rude to them which got me demoted for these reasons. They taught me to hold my temper, to just ignore people like them. Now, I am a better person, Thank you.

The Staff: I think, at this time, that this is one of the best Staff Teams ever in the lifetime in Avicus, the teamwork and communication is just getting better, and better, and better. Thank you for keeping Avicus standing up. Without you lot, Avicus would have fallen over like crumbling ruins.

Sorry if I didn’t include everybody, if I did, it would fit 8 pages of thanking people. <3

 I may come on Avicus from time to time (Holidays) but I will conceal myself. I may check the forums once a week. And I may not return to Avicus. I may will. If Avicus is still standing on July 2015.

 Bai all of you amazing people! It was nice knowing you! </3  
Oh Yeah, I heard you wanted an image of April :D, here it is, also of me looking sad! D:

Oh Yeah, I heard you wanted an image of April :D, here it is, also of me looking sad! D:
title: It is time for me... to go...

replies.body:
" DaGoldBrick and TheTrail: This might sound weird but I want to thank these guys for teaching me a lesson which got me demoted. These guys, harassed me and I always lost my temper, I became rude to them which got me demoted for these reasons. They taught me to hold my temper, to just ignore people like them. Now, I am a better person, Thank you"

If asking if you could even speak English after you falsely kicked me is harassment, call me a molester. Goodbye, but I don't appreciate you just saying that I harassed you when there was only one 'confrontation' between just you and I and otherwise I was only witness to arguments you had.

Btw, I can't speak English properly because I am Sri Lankan xD So don't blame me :D

replies.body:
Ahhhh Ingi...
Good Luck, I'm not gonna say goodbye because that means you're "Going away forever, and going away forever means forgetting."
We will all miss you, and Im sure the rest of Cacalmarin does too.
I still hold the offer of being your tour guide when you come down under :P
Dont conceal yourself when you come back, it would be great to hear from you again.
Stay in touch, thanks for everything 
Love Avum :')
GG

replies.body: Ingi! No!! D: I'll miss you, bud. I still remember the time when you told me to join Cacalmarin. I was unsure but nonetheless grateful for what you have done. Thanks so much, man! Shoot me a message in Skype if you wanna chat or discuss anything. :P I am more than happy to chat!
